Texts.Chs: 新奇的灯。我希望这个可怜的家伙在被变成。。。这个。
Texts.Eng: A novelty lamp. I must hope the poor creature didn't suffer much before being made into... this.

Texts.Chs: 有点病态的鲛人灯笼。也许别碰它。
Texts.Eng: A rather morbid looking Hylotl lantern. Maybe don't touch it.

Texts.Chs: 即使在鱼死后，这些刺仍然像以前一样锋利。
Texts.Eng: Even after the fish has perished, those spikes remain sharp as ever.

Texts.Chs: 我本以为所有人的Hyltol都超越了这样的“新奇物品”。
Texts.Eng: I'd have thought the Hyltol of all people were above "novelty items" like this.

Texts.Chs: 小鱼即使死了也显得凶猛。
Texts.Eng: Little fisssh looks fierce even in death.

Texts.Chs: 我以前的驾驶老师有一条这样的鱼。她不喜欢谈论这件事。
Texts.Eng: My old driving teacher had a fish like this. She didn't like to talk about it.

Texts.Chs: 不要在这个灯罩上闲逛。
Texts.Eng: No hangin' off from this lampshade.

Texts.Chs: 是不是。。。用真正的河豚鱼做的？
Texts.Eng: Was that... made from an actual pufferfish?
